net.jawr.web.resource.handler.bundle

Class ServletContextResourceBundleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.handler.bundle.AbstractResourceBundleHandler
      • net.jawr.web.resource.handler.bundle.ServletContextResourceBundleHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceBundleHandler

    public class ServletContextResourceBundleHandler
extends AbstractResourceBundleHandler
    This class defines the resource bundle handler which is based on the servlet context.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
